Package com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TaskKiller
    This interface should be implemented to allow components to request the killing of Mesos Tasks.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractScheduler
    Abstract Scheduler that provides some default behaviors around Mesos lifecycle events such as getting registered, reregistered, disconnected, etc.
    DefaultScheduler
    This scheduler when provided with a ServiceSpec will deploy the service and recover from encountered faults when possible.
    DefaultScheduler.Builder
    Creates a new DefaultScheduler.
    DefaultTaskKiller
    This class is a default implementation of the TaskKiller interface.
    OfferQueue
    This class acts as a buffer of Offers from Mesos.
    SchedulerApiServer
    The SchedulerApiServer runs the JettyApiServer that exposes the Scheduler's API.
    SchedulerDriverFactory
    Factory class for creating MesosSchedulerDrivers.
    SchedulerErrorCode
    This enum provides exit codes for Schedulers.
    SchedulerFlags
    This class encapsulates global Scheduler settings retrieved from the environment.
    SchedulerUtils
    This class provides utilities common to the construction and operation of Mesos Schedulers.
    SuppressReviveManager
    This class monitors all plans and suppresses or revives offers when appropriate.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SchedulerFlags.FlagException.Type
    A machine-accessible error type.
    SuppressReviveManager.State
    The states of the suppress/revive state machine.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SchedulerFlags.FlagException
    Exception which is thrown when failing to retrieve or parse a given flag value.
